metadata.title: CVE-2018-19961 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x on AMD x86 platforms,possibly allowing guest OS users to gain host OS privileges because TLBflushes do not always occur after IOMMU mapping changes.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
